trends: There have been 36 other sightings in Corona
There were no other sightings in Corona on or around September 12th 2001
divs: sighting detailsit was 4:46am on 9\12\2001 the day after 9\11. i was working the grave yard shift as a security patrol officer. i just dropped off my last nightly report at one of my properties.i looked to the east over where lake matthews is located and saw two objects hovering over the area, i could not believe what i was seeing, first of all i knew that is was not a aircraft due to the us government not allowing any aircraft in the air after the attack on 9\11 except military aircraft. the objects did not have nay navigation lights or sound. the ufos color were a bright orange-red color, like two big fireballs.i watched the objects for about 3 minutes and then they were gone. i was amazed and could not believe what i witnessed, i told a couple of coworkers and family members and they thought i was crazy. trust me i know what i saw and i believe that soon something big will happen.
Summary: Morning after 9/11/2001 I saw two bright orange lights!
